title: The Crimson Prophecy
description: A young mage discovers an ancient prophecy that could either save her kingdom or destroy everything she holds dear. When the shadows of the past collide with the present, Lyra must choose between her heart and her destiny.

title: Quantum Hearts
description: In a world where love is calculated by algorithms, Dr. Elena Vasquez discovers that her perfect match exists in a parallel universe. As reality bends around her research, she must decide if love is worth breaking the laws of physics.

title: Midnight at Rosewood High
description: When Avery transfers to the prestigious Rosewood Academy, she expects academic pressure—not supernatural mysteries. Between ancient curses, secret societies, and a brooding classmate with dangerous secrets, her senior year just got deadly.

title: The Last Lighthouse Keeper
description: On a remote Scottish island, Thomas tends to a lighthouse that hasn't guided ships in decades. When a mysterious woman washes ashore with no memory and an ancient locket, he discovers some lights are meant to guide more than just ships home.

title: Blood Moon Rising
description: In Victorian London, vampire hunter Isabella Blackthorne must protect the city from an ancient evil. But when she falls for the very creature she's sworn to destroy, the line between monster and hero becomes dangerously blurred.

title: Code Name: Phoenix
description: Former special ops agent Maya Chen thought she'd left her past behind. When her old handler recruits her for one last mission, she must infiltrate a tech billionaire's empire to stop a conspiracy that threatens global security.

title: The Dragon's Apprentice
description: Kira always dreamed of becoming a dragon rider, but when she's chosen as apprentice to the realm's most feared dragon, she discovers that some dreams come with deadly consequences. War is coming, and she's the key to victory—or destruction.

title: Digital Hearts
description: In 2089, emotions are digitized and traded like currency. Hacker Zoe discovers an illegal emotion smuggling ring, but when she falls for a mysterious trader with a dangerous past, she must choose between justice and love.

title: Secrets of Willowbrook
description: When journalist Sarah returns to her hometown to settle her grandmother's estate, she uncovers a decades-old mystery involving missing persons, buried secrets, and a family curse that might be more real than she ever imagined.
